Specimen Container(s): Transport media (M4, M4-RT, MS Media, Phosphate Buffer Solution, Saline, Stuart's Media, Tryptose Phosphate Broth, UTM-RT, Veal Infusion Broth)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): BinaxNOW Influenza A & B hinged book-shaped test device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BinaxNOW Influenza A & B Test, a rapid lateral flow immunoassay for qualitative detection of influenza A and B antigens in respiratory specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of influenza A and B nucleoprotein antigens in nasopharyngeal swab, nasal swab, and nasal wash/aspirate specimens to aid in rapid differential diagnosis of influenza A and B viral infections; negative results should be confirmed by cell culture.
